name: ArtifactoryGenericUpload
description: This task uploads generic build artifacts to Artifactory
author: JFrog
helpMarkDown: Upload artifacts to JFrog Artifactory using FileSpecs.

inputs.name: artifactoryService
inputs.label: Artifactory service
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service used for uploading artifacts.

inputs.name: fileSpec
inputs.label: Spec
inputs.helpMarkDown: To specify the artifacts you wish to upload to Artifactory, please create a File Spec. To read more about the File Spec schema click here.

inputs.name: collectBuildInfo
inputs.label: Collect build info
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select to collect build info and store it locally.
The build info can be later published to Artifactory using the "Artifactory Publish Build Info" task.

inputs.name: failNoOp
inputs.label: Fail task if no files were uploaded
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you'd like the task to fail if no files were uploaded.
